output.sentences: There were many creative costumes in the costume contest.
This guy was pretty creative in dressing as a cowboy.
Others simply purchased a mask to wear.
The judges had to pick a winner for the costumes.

The                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              All the participants gathered together  for a fun photo.
